name: Funbag Fantasy
description: Develop a romantic relationship with a sexy succubus, a princess, a female knight, and a noble woman in a fantasy world of swords and magic! There are 5 endings to complete including a final true route.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Pentium III 800MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce3/RADEON 8200 DirectX: Version 8.0a Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: PCM
recommended_requirements: Processor: Pentium 4 1.5GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce6600+/RADEON X700XT+
